flavor:
"Where the roots reach, there the temple rises."
—Niszka, Selesnya evangel

foreign_names.flavor:
„Wohin die Wurzeln reichen, dort wird sich der Tempel erheben."
—Niszka, Selesnija-Evangelistin
foreign_names.name: Tempelgarten
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {G} oder {W}.)
Sowie der Tempelgarten ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt er getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Allá donde llegan las raíces se alza el templo".
—Niszka, misionera selesnya
foreign_names.name: Jardín del templo
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Agrega {G} o {W}.)
En cuanto el Jardín del templo entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girado.

foreign_names.flavor:
« Où les racines émergent, le temple s'élève. »
—Niszka, prédicatrice de Selesnya
foreign_names.name: Jardin du temple
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {W}.)
Au moment où le Jardin du temple arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, il arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Dove giungono le radici, là sorge il tempio."
—Niszka, evangelista di Selesnya
foreign_names.name: Giardino del Tempio
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {G} o {W}.)
Mentre il Giardino del Tempio entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.

foreign_names.flavor:
「根の達するところに、寺院は建つのです」
――セレズニアの福音者、ニシュカ
foreign_names.name: 寺院の庭
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{G}か{W}を加える。）
寺院の庭が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor:
"뿌리가 닿는 곳이면, 그곳에 신전이 세워진다."
—셀레스냐 전도사, 니스즈카
foreign_names.name: 정원 신전
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {G} 또는 {W}를 추가한다.)
정원 신전이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 정원 신전은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Onde as raízes chegam, lá se ergue o templo."
— Niszka, missionária Selesnya
foreign_names.name: Jardim do Templo
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Adicione {G} ou {W}.)
Conforme Jardim do Templo entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ele entrará no campo de batalha virado.

foreign_names.flavor:
«Всюду, куда дотянутся корни, вознесется новый храм».
— Нишка, благовестница Селезнии
foreign_names.name: Церковный Сад
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {G} или {W}.)
При выходе Церковного Сада на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, он выходит на поле битвы повернутым.

foreign_names.flavor:
「繁根所及之处，殿堂拔地而起。」
～瑟雷尼亚福音师尼斯卡
foreign_names.name: 殿堂花园
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{G}或{W}。）
于殿堂花园进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则殿堂花园须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor:
「繁根所及之處，殿堂拔地而起。」
～瑟雷尼亞福音師尼斯卡
foreign_names.name: 殿堂花園
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{G}或{W}。）
於殿堂花園進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則殿堂花園須橫置進戰場。

name: Temple Garden
original_text: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.) As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
